Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Considering its value and potential impact on your projects, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
